alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 7:44PM MST until September 11 at 8:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 845 PM MST. * At 744 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Maricopa, or 12 miles west of Casa Grande, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Maricopa, Bapchule, Olberg, Stanfield, Ak- Chin Village, Sacaton and Santan. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 174 and 188. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 155 and 174. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 149 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
